bibl.title: Fawns and Kingfishers. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Examines the approach to old age in Sappho's fragment 58 V. and Alcman's fragment 26 PMG: The gender of the narrator in Sappho's fragment 58 V.; - Alcman's kingfisher poem.
bibl.seg: Andersen Laerke, Fawns and Kingfishers. Avec résumé en anglais.
Examines the approach to old age in Sappho's fragment 58 V. and Alcman's fragment 26 PMG: The gender of the narrator in Sappho's fragment 58 V.; - Alcman's kingfisher poem.
